description: Send the message when the IPSec tunnel is established.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelStart HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecIfIndex u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelPolicyNum u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelIndex u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelRuleId u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelDstIP a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelInsideIP a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelRemotePort u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelCpuID u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelSrcIP a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelLifeSize u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelLifeTime u 9999

description: Index of the router interface corresponding to the IPSec tunnel.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecIfIndex

description: ID of the ACL rule in the current IPSec policy.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelPolicyNum

description: Index of the IPSec tunnel.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelIndex

description: ID of the ACL rule in the current IPSec policy.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelRuleId

description: Destination IP address of the tunnel (peer end).
variables.name: HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelDstIP

description: Intranet IP address of the peer end during remote access.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelInsideIP

description: Port number of the peer end of the tunnel.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelRemotePort

description: CPU ID of the tunnel.
variables.name: HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelCpuID

description: Source IP address of the tunnel (local end).
variables.name: HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelSrcIP

description: Life cycle of the IPSec tunnel (in kbytes).
variables.name: HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelLifeSize

description: Life cycle of the IPSec tunnel (in seconds).
variables.name: HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelLifeTime

description: Send the message when the IPSec tunnel is deleted.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelStop HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecIfIndex u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelPolicyNum u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelIndex u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelRuleId u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelDstIP a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelInsideIP a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelRemotePort u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelCpuID u 9999 HUAWEI-SECURITY-IPSEC-MIB::hwIPSecTunnelSrcIP a 192.0.2.1
